title: Expose common app actions as shortcuts
summary: Many operating systems support showing shortcut menus, or jump-list, when the user right-clicks or long-presses an app icon. For example, on Windows, right-clicking on any pinned program in the taskbar shows a list of program-specific actions and recently opened files:
